panel.title: Trends in mine tailings reported from surface mining facilities
panel.content: Total reported tailings from oil sands surface mining facilities have increased by 56% between 2010 and 2019, an increase of 24,517 tonnes. Five of these facilities have been in production and have reported to the NPRI since before 2010. Of these facilities, four reported increases in their total tailings disposals between 2018 and 2019 and three reported decreases.
